title: Architecture Overview
body_html:
Multi-Agent Search System Architecture

Hierarchical Design

graph TD
    Coordinator --> Searcher1
    Coordinator --> Searcher2
    Coordinator --> Searcher3
    Searcher1 --> Aggregator
    Searcher2 --> Aggregator
    Searcher3 --> Aggregator
    Aggregator --> User

Key Components:

  1. Coordinator Agent

    • Query decomposition
    • Agent orchestration
    • Quality control

  2. Searcher Agents

    • Specialized search execution
    • Result collection
    • Relevance scoring

  3. Aggregator Agent

    • Deduplication
    • Conflict resolution
    • Synthesis

Letta Integration Points

  • State management
  • Tool calling framework
  • Message bus

Performance Considerations

  • Optimal agent count (3-7)
  • Timeout handling
  • Fallback mechanisms
